edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members

Class ReadActiveMembersServlet

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.servlet.GenericServlet
      • javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        • edu.neu.ccis.sms.servlets.members.ReadActiveMembersServlet
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, javax.servlet.Servlet, javax.servlet.ServletConfig

    @WebServlet(value="/ReadActiveMembers")
public class ReadActiveMembersServlet
extends javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
    Read all the active child members for the given category and parent member id, presenting these members formatted as values of a select box.

    This servlet expects following request parameters -
    1) RequestKeys.PARAM_PARENT_MEMBER_ID - Member for which existing active child members needs to be fetched
    2) RequestKeys.PARAM_CATEGORY_NAME - Category for which existing active members needs to be fetched
    Author:
    Swapnil Gupta
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • doPost

        protected void doPost(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
               throws javax.servlet.ServletException,
                      java.io.IOException
        When the request is received, it provides all the active child members for given category, with their parent as the given parent member id. The child members are formatted as option values of a select box. First value is a default option. If no such child member exist, only default option is returned
        Overrides:
        doPost in class javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet
        Throws:
        javax.servlet.ServletException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
